scripts.build:clean: npm run clean && npm install && npm run build
scripts.init:
echo "#! /bin/sh

exec npm run build" > .git/hooks/pre-push && chmod +x .git/hooks/pre-commit
scripts.postinstall: lerna bootstrap --reject-cycles && cd app && npm install --no-package-lock
scripts.publish:release: npm install && npm run build && lerna publish from-git --dist-tag latest --no-git-reset
scripts.publish:release:fix: npm install && npm run build && lerna publish from-package --dist-tag latest --no-git-reset
scripts.publish:canary: npm run build:clean && lerna publish --canary --dist-tag canary --no-git-reset
